text: Bjelland is a surname that is derived from several farms in Norway. It consists of the Old Norse word bær and for a farm or farmstead and the word for land. Notable people with the surname include: * Anders Andersen Bjelland (1790–1850), a Norwegian politician * Andreas Bjelland (born 1988), a Danish footballer * Christian Bjelland (disambiguation), multiple people * Kat Bjelland (born 1963), an American musician * Sveinung Bjelland (born 1970), a Norwegian classical pianist ==See also== * Bjelland (disambiguation) Category:Norwegian-language surnames
title: Bjelland (surname)
